name: query-domains
title: Query.Domains
description: Check domain WHOIS, availability, traffic, and tech stack in one place
author: nextwalkerovo

preferences.name: tldList
preferences.title: TLD List
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of TLDs to check (e.g., com,ai,org,net,io)

commands.name: check-domain-availability
commands.title: Query Domains
commands.subtitle: Domain Availability Checker
commands.description: Check if domains are available and view registration details

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
